$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure 'External sharing' of calendars is not available |
| Why should you use this? | Prevents external calendar sharing, reducing the risk of attackers learning about organizational relationships. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users may experience a minor inconvenience when scheduling meetings or synchronizing calendars with people outside the tenant. |
| Learn more | [Share calendars with external users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/admin/manage/share-calendars-with-external-users?view=o365-worldwide) |
